OASIS.Definition: a place in a desert where there is water and plants

SIN.Definition: an act of breaking a religious or moral law

TREACHEROUS.Definition: extremely dangerous, especially due to bad weather conditions

DAM.Definition: a wall built across a river to stop the water, creating an artificial lake

IRRIGATION.Definition: supplying the land with water in order to grow plants

GAMBLING.Definition: playing games of chance in order to win money

WORKFORCE.Definition: a group of people who work in a company, industry etc.

RESORTS.Definition: places where people go for vacation

GANG.Definition: a group of people behaving bad and usually involving in criminal activities
